title: Zisui Zhi Chen - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Ancient China   Character Growth   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Near-Death Experience   Older Love Interests   Politics   Power Couple   Power Struggle   Wars
author: Tang Jiuqing   唐酒卿
description:
Everyone is afraid of Bai Jiu’s unpredictable temperament.
And it was only Xin Yi who could hold him down.

A story of an unfortunate young prince who is pampered by a cruel and sinisterly ruthless minister.>
